name: Atlantropia
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Athlantropia, the realm of mystery. Go in search of the 7 lost objects to be able to recapture your kingdom from which you were hunted after an attack. Explore ancient monuments in search of these legendary items, from the wand of Ragnarok to the cloak of Oros. Use your wits to get all the pieces needed to fight the final boss, the one who ousted you and forced you to escape.

Are you ready for adventure?

DEVELOPER: Daniel

CREATOR OF THE STORY: Alex

COMMANDS:

A - Move left

D - Move right

ENTER - For interact

HOLD E - View inventory

CREDITS:

---- Some Assets ----

COMMUNICATION FROM DEVELOPER:

The game was created in a short time, so it may have some bugs, for this reason we ask everyone who tries our game to leave a comment with ideas and advice. Thanks for your help.
